common.name: .18 Derringer
common.text: +2 to Combat Checks. .18 Derringer cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.

common.name: .38 Revolver
common.text: +3 to Combat Checks

common.name: .45 Automatic
common.text: +4 to Combat Checks

common.name: Ancient Tome
common.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend movement points to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and discard Ancient Tome. If you fail, nothing happens.

common.name: Axe
common.text: +2 to Combat Checks (+3 instead if your other hand is empty)

common.name: Bullwhip
common.text: +1 to Combat Checks. Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll 1 die after making a Combat check.

common.name: Cavalry Saber
common.text: +2 to Combat Checks

common.name: Cross
common.text: +0 to Combat Checks (+3 if opponent is Undead) +1 to Horror checks.

common.name: Dark Cloak
common.text: +1 to Evade Checks

common.name: Dynamite
common.text: +8 to Combat Checks (Discard after use)

common.name: Food
common.text: Any Phase: Discard Food to reduce any Stamina loss by 1.

common.name: Knife
common.text: +1 to Combat Checks

common.name: Lantern
common.text: +1 to Luck Checks

common.name: Lucky Cigarette Case
common.text: Any Phase: Discard Lucky Cigarette Case to re-roll any one skill check.

common.name: Map of Arkham
common.text: Movement: Exhaust to get 1 extra movement point.

common.name: Motorcycle
common.text: Movement: Exhaust to get 2 extra movement points.

common.name: Old Journal
common.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 1 movement point to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, gain 3 Clue tokens and discard Old Journal. If you fail, nothing happens.

common.name: Research Materials
common.text: Any Phase: Discard Research Materials instead of spending 1 Clue token.

common.name: Rifle
common.text: +5 to Combat Checks

common.name: Shotgun
common.text: +4 to Combat Checks. Any Phase: When using Shotgun in Combat, all 6's rolled count as 2 successes.

common.name: Tommy Gun
common.text: +6 to Combat Checks

common.name: Whiskey
common.text: Any Phase: Discard Whiskey to reduce any Sanity loss by 1.

unique.name: Alien Statue
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points and 1 Sanity to roll a die. If the die is a success, draw 1 Spell or gain 3 Clue tokens. If it is a failure, lose 2 Stamina.

unique.name: Ancient Tablet
unique.text: Movement: Spend 3 movement points and discard Ancient Tablet to roll 2 dice. For every success rolled, draw 1 Spell. For every failure rolled, gain 2 Clue tokens.

unique.name: Book of Dyzan
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell, lose 1 Sanity, and put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Book of Dyzan. If there are 2 Stamina tokens on it, discard Book of Dyzan. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Blue Watcher of the Pyramid
unique.text: Any Phase: Lose 2 Stamina and discard Blue Watcher of the Pyramid to automatically succeed at a Combat check or a Fight or Lore check made to close a gate. This cannot be used against an Ancient One.

unique.name: Cabala of Saboth
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Skill and discard Cabala of Saboth. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Cultes Des Goules
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and gain 1 Clue token, but lose 2 Sanity and discard Cultes Des Goules. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Dragon's Eye
unique.text: Any Phase: Exhaust and lose 1 Sanity after drawing a gate or location card to draw a new card in its place.

unique.name: Elder Sign
unique.text: Arkham Encounter Phase: When closing a gate, lose 1 Stamina and 1 Sanity and return this card to the box. You do not need to make a skill check or spend any Clue tokens to seal the gate. In addition, remove one doom token from the Ancient One's doom track.

unique.name: Enchanted Blade
unique.text: +4 to Combat Checks

unique.name: Enchanted Jewelry
unique.text: Any Phase: Put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Enchanted Jewelry to avoid losing 1 Stamina. If there are 3 Stamina tokens on it, discard Enchanted Jewelry.

unique.name: Enchanted Knife
unique.text: +3 to Combat Checks

unique.name: Flute of the Outer Gods
unique.text: Any Phase: Lose 3 Sanity and 3 Stamina and discard Flute of the Outer Gods before making a Combat check to defeat all monsters in your current area. This does not affect Ancient Ones.

unique.name: Gate Box
unique.text: Any Phase: When you return to Arkham from an Other World, you can return to any location with an open gate, not just those leading to the Other World you were in.

unique.name: Healing Stone
unique.text: Upkeep: Exhaust to gain 1 Stamina or 1 Sanity. Discard this card if the Ancient One awakens.

unique.name: Holy Water
unique.text: +6 to Combat Checks (Discard after use)

unique.name: Lamp of Alhazred
unique.text: +5 to Combat Checks

unique.name: Nameless Cults
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 1 movement point to make a Lore (-1) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell, lose 1 Sanity, and discard Nameless Cults. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Necronomicon
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, draw 1 Spell and lose 2 Sanity. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Obsidian Statue
unique.text: Any Phase: Discard Obsidian Statue to cancel all Stamina or Sanity loss being dealt to you from one source.

unique.name: Pallid Mask
unique.text: +2 to Evade Checks

unique.name: Powder of Ibn-Ghazi
unique.text: +9 to Combat Checks (Lose 1 Sanity and discard after use)

unique.name: Ruby of R'lyeh
unique.text: Movement: You get 3 extra movement points.

unique.name: Silver Key
unique.text: Any Phase: Put 1 Stamina token from the bank on Silver Key before making an Evade check to automatically pass it. Discard Silver Key after using it if there are 3 Stamina tokens on it.

unique.name: Sword of Glory
unique.text: +6 to Combat Checks

unique.name: The King in Yellow
unique.text: Movement: Exhaust and spend 2 movement points to make a Lore (-2) check. If you pass, gain 4 Clue tokens, lose 1 Sanity, and discard The King in Yellow. If you fail, nothing happens.

unique.name: Warding Statue
unique.text: Any Phase: Discard Warding Statue after failing a Combat check to reduce the monster's combat damage to 0 Stamina. This can also be used to cancel an Ancient One's entire attack for 1 turn.

spell.name: Shrivelling
spell.text: Any Phase: Cast and exhaust to gain +6 to Combat checks until the end of this combat.

ally.name: Anna Kaslow
ally.text: +2 Luck. Gain 2 Clue tokens when Anna Kaslow joins you.

skill.name: Bravery
skill.text: Any Phase: Exhaust to re-roll a Horror check

special.name: Bank Loan
special.text: Gain $10 when you take this card. Upkeep: Roll a die. On a 1-3, pay $1 or discard all of your items along with this card. You cannot get another Bank Loan this game. Any Phase: Pay a $10 to pay off your Bank Loan and discard this card. You may choose to take out a new Bank Loan later on during this game.

special.name: Blessing
special.text: Upkeep: Roll a die and discard this card on a 1. When rolling dice, you score successes on a 4, 5, or 6. If you are Cursed, discard this card instead of gaining a Curse card.

special.name: Curse
special.text: Upkeep: Roll a die and discard this card on a 1. When rolling dice, you score only score successes on a 6. If you are Blessed, discard this card instead of gaining a Blessing card.

special.name: Silver Twilight Lodge Membership
special.text: Any Phase: Whenever you have an encounter at the Silver Twilight Lodge, you have an encounter at the Inner Sanctum instead.

special.name: Retainer
special.text: Upkeep: Gain $2, the roll a die. Discard this card on a 1.

special.name: Deputy of Arkham
special.text: When you gain this card, take the Deputy's Revolver and the Patrol Wagon as well. Upkeep: Gain $1.

special.name: Deputy's Revolver
special.text: +3 to Combat Checks. Deputy's Revolver cannot be lost or stolen unless you choose to allow it.

special.name: Patrol Wagon
special.text: Movement: If you are in Arkham, you may move to any street area or location in Arkham instead of your normal movement. Roll a die at the end of each Combat and whenever you return to Arkham from an Other World. On a 1, return this card to the box.
